About Me

I am a Computer Science graduate and versatile developer specializing in Flutter, PHP, and AI-driven solutions. With a strong foundation in building NLP models and RAG-based chatbots, I enjoy bridging the gap between complex backend logic and user-friendly interfaces. My experience ranges from developing full-stack web applications to delivering cross-platform mobile apps as a freelance developer. I am a natural problem-solver committed to writing efficient code and creating impactful software that solves real-world problems. Currently, I am eager to apply my technical skills in an entry-level role where I can contribute to innovative team projects.
